NAEB RADIO NETWORK
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois

Georgetown Radio Forum (56-51)
Program 24 - Issue 11
Topic: HEART RESEARCH: PROGRESS REPORT
Panelists: Dr. Clayton B. Ethridge, Cardiologist and Professor of Clinical Medicine,
George Washington University Hospital;
Dr. Proctor Harvey, Associate Professor of Medicine and Director of the
Heart Station, Georgetown University Hospital;
Dr. James Watt, Director of the National Heart Institute.
Program 25 - Issue 12
Topic: TARIFF PROTECTION: HOW MUCH AND FOR WHOM?
Panelists: George L. Bell, President, Committee for a National Trade Policy;
0. R. Strackbein, Chairman, Nationwide Committee of Industry, Agriculture,
and Labor on Import-Export Policy.
Program 26 - Issue 13
Topic: INSANITY AND CRIMINAL RESPONSIBILITY
Panelists: Members of the Georgetown University Law Centerâ€™s Moot Court team: Miss
Yvonne Cravens, Oklahoma City, Oklahoma; Mr. William Beckett, Washington,
D. C.; Mr. Harold J. Sullivan, Carbondale, Pennsylvania.
***************

Program 26 - Issue 12
Topic: BRITISH VISITORS TO BROADWAY
Program 27 - Issue 13
Topic: BROADWAY DURING JANUARY AND FEBRUARY
